author: geirm
msg: Default distribution provided global VM library.  (I am sure this will draw howls of protest. :)  It contains a single example Velocimacro, #quietnull( $arg ) which behaves exactly as $!arg.  Just wanted to show how a global library would work, and test the protection mechanism - by default, you can't define inline any VM that was loaded previously.

author: geirm
msg: Example template to use both a global library VM as well as define inline and use.

author: geirm
msg: Added velocimacro.vm as a test case.

author: geirm
msg: Proxy Directive for Velocimacros.  Is analagous to Foreach.java, Parse.java.  It's job is to patch in the instance-use arguments to the VM, parse the VM, and then render the output using the context.
